Package filehandler.filehelperservice

Class FileOperationHelpers

java.lang.Object
filehandler.filehelperservice.FileOperationHelpers
public class FileOperationHelpers extends Object
A utility class providing various file operations and helper methods.

    • getFileName

      public static String getFileName(File file)
      Retrieves the name of the file without its extension.
      Parameters:
      file - The File object from which to extract the name.
      Returns:
      The name of the file without the extension.

    • getFileExtension

      public static String getFileExtension(File file)
      Retrieves the extension of the file.
      Parameters:
      file - The File object from which to extract the extension.
      Returns:
      The extension of the file, or an empty string if no extension exists.

    • getFileNameArray

      private static String[] getFileNameArray(File file)
      Splits the file name into its name and extension components.
      Parameters:
      file - The File object to be processed.
      Returns:
      An array where the first element is the file name and the second is the extension.

    • isValidFileType

      public static boolean isValidFileType(File file, List<String> validExtensions)
      Checks if a given file has a valid extension based on a list of allowed extensions.
      Parameters:
      file - The File object to check.
      validExtensions - A list of valid extensions.
      Returns:
      True if the file has a valid extension, false otherwise.

    • createDirectories

      public static void createDirectories(File file, boolean suppressLog)
      Creates directories for a given file path if they do not already exist.
      Parameters:
      file - The File object representing the directory to create.
      suppressLog - If true, suppresses logging output; otherwise logs success or failure.

    • getParentDirectoryPath

      public static String getParentDirectoryPath(File file)
      Retrieves the parent directory path of a given file.
      Parameters:
      file - The File object whose parent directory path is to be retrieved.
      Returns:
      The path of the parent directory as a String.

    • createAssignmentIterator

      public static filehandler.traversal.DirectoryIterator createAssignmentIterator(String sourceDirectoryPath) throws IOException
      Creates a DirectoryIterator for traversing files in a specified source directory.
      Parameters:
      sourceDirectoryPath - The path of the source directory to iterate over.
      Returns:
      A DirectoryIterator for the specified directory.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs while accessing the directory.

    • getDirectoryFilesOfExt

      public static File[] getDirectoryFilesOfExt(File directory, String extension)
      Retrieves files from a directory that have a specific extension, excluding files that start with "__".
      Parameters:
      directory - The directory from which to retrieve files.
      extension - The desired file extension (e.g., ".txt").
      Returns:
      An array of Files that match the specified extension, or null if none found.

    • pathToFile

      public static File pathToFile(String path)
      Converts a string path into a File object.
      Parameters:
      path - The string representation of the path to convert.
      Returns:
      A File object representing the specified path.

    • deletePopulatedDirectory

      public static void deletePopulatedDirectory(File file)
      Recursively deletes all files and subdirectories within a specified directory, and then deletes the directory itself.
      Parameters:
      file - The directory to delete along with its contents.
